Initial commit: DataFlow - Clay.com Clone

Features implemented:

- Spreadsheet interface with virtual scrolling
- CSV import/export functionality
- Filtering and sorting system
- Google Vertex AI integration for data enrichment
- Enrichment configuration panel with custom prompts

Components:
- Glass UI components (Button, Input, Card, Modal, etc.)
- Animated background with floating orbs
- Context menu and dropdown menus
- Toast notifications
- Sidebar with project tree
- Spreadsheet with resizable columns
